Class ClickableTool

java.lang.Object
ClickableTool
Direct Known Subclasses:
Airbrush, BlurTool, Clear, CropTool, CutterTool, Delete, DrawingTool, EyeDropperTool, FillTool, ImageLoader, MenuClickableTool, ProjectLoader, SelectionTool, ShapeTool, TextTool, UndoTool
public abstract class ClickableTool extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClickableTool(LayerObserver layerObserver, UndoTool undo)
    ClickableTool is mainly used to represent the properties of any tool that is used through a Clickable/Button Mainly this class specifies if a tool has an affect on the following: - Does the Tool needs to update the Undo History when used - Does the Tool Rasterize Shape Layers by modifying them (for example drawing on a shape layer) - Does the Tool needs to update the Layers Panel when used

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    addToolBtn(Clickable toolBtn)
    used to add a Clickable that is associated withe the Clickable Tool
    ArrayList<Clickable>
    getClickables()
     
    protected abstract void
    initTool(UndoTool undo)
    initTool is an abstract method used by each tool to specify its specific properties
    protected LayerData
    rasterizeLayer(LayerData layer, LayersHandler layersHandler)
    rasterizeLayer prompts the user to accept if he really wants to rasterize the shape layer and the replaces the shape layers with the rasterized version
    protected void
    recordChange()
    used to record the undo history whenver a change has been made
    protected void
    setAsChangeMaker(UndoTool undo)
    sets this tool as a tool that needs to update the Undo History when used
    protected void
    setAsLayerChanger()
    sets this tool as a tool that updates the layers panel whenver used
    protected void
    setAsShapeRasterizer()
    sets this tool as a tool that needs to rasterize shape Layers when trying to modify a shape layer (for example drawing on a shape layer)
    protected void
    updateLayerObserver()
    used to update the layers panel to reflect the current state of the layers

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ClickableTool

      public ClickableTool(LayerObserver layerObserver, UndoTool undo)
      ClickableTool is mainly used to represent the properties of any tool that is used through a Clickable/Button Mainly this class specifies if a tool has an affect on the following: - Does the Tool needs to update the Undo History when used - Does the Tool Rasterize Shape Layers by modifying them (for example drawing on a shape layer) - Does the Tool needs to update the Layers Panel when used
      Parameters:
      layerObserver - the Layers Panel (In other words the layerObserver represent any class that needs to have an up to date record of the layers)
      undo - the undo tool that manages the undo and redo logic

  • Method Details

    • addToolBtn

      protected void addToolBtn(Clickable toolBtn)
      used to add a Clickable that is associated withe the Clickable Tool
      Parameters:
      toolBtn - the tool Clickable/Button

    • setAsChangeMaker

      protected void setAsChangeMaker(UndoTool undo)
      sets this tool as a tool that needs to update the Undo History when used
      Parameters:
      undo - the undo tool that manages the undo and redo logic

    • recordChange

      protected void recordChange()
      used to record the undo history whenver a change has been made

    • getClickables

      public ArrayList<Clickable> getClickables()
      Returns:
      a Collection containg the Clickable/s associated with this tool

    • setAsShapeRasterizer

      protected void setAsShapeRasterizer()
      sets this tool as a tool that needs to rasterize shape Layers when trying to modify a shape layer (for example drawing on a shape layer)

    • rasterizeLayer

      protected LayerData rasterizeLayer(LayerData layer, LayersHandler layersHandler)
      rasterizeLayer prompts the user to accept if he really wants to rasterize the shape layer and the replaces the shape layers with the rasterized version
      Parameters:
      layer - the shape layer that needs to be rasterized
      layersHandler - the layers handler that handles all layers on the canvas
      Returns:
      null if the user didn't want to rasterize the shape layer or the rasterized version of the shape layer

    • setAsLayerChanger

      protected void setAsLayerChanger()
      sets this tool as a tool that updates the layers panel whenver used

    • updateLayerObserver

      protected void updateLayerObserver()
      used to update the layers panel to reflect the current state of the layers

    • initTool

      protected abstract void initTool(UndoTool undo)
      initTool is an abstract method used by each tool to specify its specific properties
